data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Mahendragarh, Haryana, India to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Mahendragarh, Haryana, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Mahendragarh to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Mahendragarh, Haryana, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Mahendragarh prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Balai (Hindu traditions) people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Balai (Hindu traditions) people know you.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Mahendragarh.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the county of Mahendragarh.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 10,143 believers in Mahendragarh that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

location.name: Mahendragarh
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Parikh, Badwa, Rajput Khaimkani, Rajput Kachhwaha, Rajput Shikari
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Brahmin Parikh (146,000), Badwa (2,700), Rajput Khaimkani (32,000), Rajput Kachhwaha (708,000), Rajput Shikari (700)
